item.description:
It's time for jingle bells & twinkly lights & our annual Yankee swap! If you would like to join in the festivities with your pup Sunday December 16th from 11:00am til 1:00pm please bring a pre-wrapped gift for the swap along with an item to donate to a pet in need this holiday. We can't wait to see all our Best Friends again this month playing Reindeer Games, Kissing Under the Mistletoe, & learning how to be good little elves at Santas Workshop! Special treat for pups dressed in holiday style! See you all soon!
Proof of Current Vaccines Required: Rabies, DHLPP, Bordatella
item.name: Holiday Yankee Swap!
